plugins.name: expo-image-picker
plugins.photosPermissions: This app accesses your photos to let you share photos of you payments receipts. You can change this in the app settings.
plugins.cameraPermissions: This app accesses your camera to let you take photos of you payments receipts. You can change this in the app settings.

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photos to let you share photos of you payments receipts. You can change this in the app settings.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app accesses your camera to let you take photos of you payments receipts. You can change this in the app settings.
